review: Overall, I think the Fire TV is great. It has everything I need on it, Hulu, YouTube, Netflix, Amazon Instant Movies, etc. The only complaint I have is that if I haven't used it for a while it seems to forget that I have installed the Netflix app on it. I have had to redownload the app several times and sign into my account all over again as if it was never installed. It's kind of a pain when you just want to sit and watch a movie. Besides that, it works great and I love it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The Amazon Fire TV worked as advertised.  In fact, the content is better than expected prompting us not to purchase Netflix.  You can get the same content (newer versions also) with the Fire TV.  Installation is a breeze, voice search is fast and gets results.  Only caveat, the info returned is the first one found not necessarily what you desired.  For example say Game of Thrones and you may get the app for the "game" Game of Thrones not the HBO series.One negative is it is virtually impossible to just browse.  You can browse on cable by simply viewing the cable guide.  On Fire TV there are almost (slight exaggeration)  as many venues as channel selections on cable.Bottom line, good job.  We hope to cut the cord soon.
author: David Graft
